summary: An ordinance granting permission to F.G. Thomas to improve the alley in block 33, Capitol Hill Addition, Divisions Nos. 5 & No. 7, from a point fifty-nine and thirty-five one hundredths (59.35) feet south of East Galer Street to East Galer Street, by constructing concrete walk and stairway, at his own cost and expense, under certain terms and conditions.
